subject: Physics
goals: Understand the basics of quantum physics, particularly the concept of wave-particle duality and its implications.
milestones: By the end of the week, be able to explain the wave-particle duality and describe the significance of the double-slit experiment in demonstrating this concept.

learning_tasks.task: Read introductory materials on quantum mechanics focusing on wave-particle duality.
Watch a video explaining the double-slit experiment and wave-particle duality.

practice_tasks.task: Write a summary explaining wave-particle duality and the double-slit experiment.

resources: 1. Textbook: 'Conceptual Physics' by Paul Hewitt - Chapter 27 on Quantum Theory. 2. Video: 'The Double-Slit Experiment' by Veritasium on YouTube. 3. Online resource: 'Quantum Physics for Beginners' on Khan Academy.
